column5: Anyone know for sure if there is a fire ban currently. I was looking on the Ontario MNR and it looks to me like you can't have afire anywhere in ontario as of tuesday until further notice.
Sounds about right. We just had several plane loads of people sent in to St. John's amublance due to the extensive forest fires up north.It's getting pretty bad.
I just called the MNR and was told that you can use Coleman stoves to fix shore lunch. These are not considered to be an open flame.Fred
Yes, there is a ban on fires.http://www.mnr.gov.on.ca/MNR/affmb/F...ia/RFZ_Map.htm
The fire ban was lifted on July 26.
The ban has been lifted go to http://www.bowesnet.com/dailyminer/H...ul26news2.htmlfrom the Kenora Miner & News
